text:
Poll by ThinkHQ shows Alberta's debt/deficit is one of the top 5 issues for voters, ranking ahead of health care, taxes & education, but behind gov trust, economy, pipelines & unemployment concerns.
https://calgaryherald.com/business/energy/varcoe-balance-the-books-by-2023-dont-count-on-it-says-conference-board/ … #abvote #ableg #yyc
author: ChrisVarcoe

text:
Varcoe: Alberta is unlikely to balance budget by 2023, warns Conference Board.
“We don’t think the revenues are there to balance,” says board economist Daniel Fields. “There is still an over-reliance on oil.” https://calgaryherald.com/business/energy/varcoe-balance-the-books-by-2023-dont-count-on-it-says-conference-board/ … #ableg #yyc #yeg #abvote
author: ChrisVarcoe

text:
Varcoe: Alberta still isn't on a path to balance budget by 2023, says Conference Board.
“The gov’s current plan is to continue shrinking the deficit every year until the budget balances in 2023-24. In our assessment, this is unlikely to happen"
https://calgaryherald.com/business/energy/varcoe-balance-the-books-by-2023-dont-count-on-it-says-conference-board/ … #ableg #yyc
